params.amountCollateral: The amount of the collateral to deposit
params.tokenCollateralAddress: The address of the token to deposit as collateral

params.amountCollateral: The amount of collateral to deposit
params.amountDSCToMint: The amount of decentralized stablecoin to mint
params.tokenCollateralAddress: The address of the token you want to deposit as collateral

params.debtToCover: The amount of DSC you want to burn to improve the user's health factor
params.tokenCollateral: The ERC20 collateral token address to liquidate
params.user: The user who has a broken health factor

params.amountDSCToBeBurned: The amount of Decentralized Stable Coin to be burned
params.tokenCollateralAddress: The address of the token used as collateral

depositCollateralAndMintDSC(address,uint.notice: This function will deposit collateral and mint DSC in one transaction.

liquidate(address,address,uint256).notice: You can partially liquidate a userYou will get a liquidation bonus for taking users fundsThe function assumes the protocol is overcollateralizedA known bug would be if the protocol was 100% collateralzed or less, then the liquidation bonus would not be possible

mintDSC(uint256).notice: follows CEIThey must have more collateral value than the minimum threshold

redeemCollateralForDSC(address,uint256,u.notice: This function burns DSC and redeems underlying collateral in one tranasaction
